_metadata.description: SEO metadata per product for search engines and social sharing.

fields.seoTitle: Page title for search results (max 60 chars)
fields.seoDescription: Meta description for search results (max 160 chars)
fields.ogImage: Open Graph image URL, alt, caption, width, height for social sharing
fields.published: Whether the product page is live

products.seoTitle: Amaranth Greens | Bledo Wildcrafted Amaranthus Leafy
products.seoDescription: Wild-gathered Amaranthus leaves from Honduran fields. A sacred Mesoamerican superfood, dried to preserve its nutritional power.
products.ogImageAlt: Pile of dried dark green amaranth greens on white background
products.ogImageCaption: Wildcrafted amaranth greens from Honduras - finely cut dried leaves for traditional herbal preparations

products.seoTitle: Miskito Batana Oil Blend for Hair Condition and Nourishment
products.seoDescription: Authentic Batana Oil hair conditioner from La Mosquitia Honduras. Cleansing & restorative ingredients for natural hair growth and repair. Wholesale available.
products.ogImageAlt: Black pump bottle of Forestal MT Batana Oil Hair Conditioner with Miskito palm nut branding
products.ogImageCaption: Batana Oil Hair Conditioner - Pure & unrefined Elaeis oleifera kernel oil from La Mosquitia, Honduras in 500ml bottle

products.seoTitle: Pure Miskito Batana Oil Shampoo Raw Ingredient
products.seoDescription: Gentle Batana Oil shampoo from La Mosquitia, Honduras. An ancestral nourishing blend for hair nourishment and natural growth. Wholesale worldwide.
products.ogImageAlt: Black pump bottle of Forestal MT Batana Oil Hair Wash with ancestral Miskito elixir branding
products.ogImageCaption: Batana Oil Hair Wash - Pure & unrefined Elaeis oleifera kernel oil for follicle restoration from La Mosquitia, Honduras

products.seoTitle: Handcrafted Miskito Batana Oil True Soap for Skin and Hair
products.seoDescription: 100% true-origin artisanal batana oil soap sourced from La Mosquitia, Honduras. Daily soap for soft hair, skin, and body care. Wholesale worldwide.
products.ogImageAlt: Black box packaging of Forestal MT Batana Oil Soap Bar with gold lettering and palm nut icon
products.ogImageCaption: Batana Oil True Soap Bar - 100% saponified Elaeis oleifera kernel oil from La Mosquitia, Honduras (2.6 oz)

products.seoTitle: Bay Leaves | Wild & Shade-dried Laurel from Honduras
products.seoDescription: Wild-harvested aromatic laurel leaves from Honduras' highlands. Shade-dried to preserve volatile oils for culinary and herbal use.

products.seoTitle: Cundeamor | Wild Bitter Melon Charantia Herb
